content: **from the yarnspirations website ** *this easy crochet afghan stitches up quickly making it a terrific project for beginners and advanced crocheters alike achieve beautiful dimension and texture with this pattern while stitching in red heart fiesta in any shade that inspires your project lay it over your favorite sofa or chair to add a fresh accent of warmth to any interior setting * softly textured crochet afghan is a terrific project for beginners and advanced crocheters alike and makes a quick and easy gift or fresh accent for your home
